body.raw:
[{
    "title": "Ensalada César",
    "description": "Una clásica ensalada con pollo, lechuga romana y aderezo César.",
    "ingredients": [
        "lechuga romana",
        "pollo",
        "pan tostado",
        "queso parmesano",
        "aderezo César"
    ],
    "category": "ensaladas",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/ensalada-cesar.jpg ",
    "difficulty": "facil"
},
{
    "title": "Tarta de Manzana",
    "description": "Un postre clásico con manzanas caramelizadas y masa hojaldrada.",
    "ingredients": [
        "manzanas",
        "azúcar",
        "mantequilla",
        "hojaldre",
        "canela"
    ],
    "category": "postre",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/tarta-manzana.jpg ",
    "difficulty": "medio"
},
{
    "title": "Paella Valenciana",
    "description": "Un plato tradicional español con arroz, mariscos y verduras.",
    "ingredients": [
        "arroz",
        "calamares",
        "gambas",
        "pimientos",
        "tomate",
        "azafrán"
    ],
    "category": "principal",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/paella-valenciana.jpg ",
    "difficulty": "medio"
},
{
    "title": "Batido de Fresa",
    "description": "Un batido refrescante hecho con fresas frescas y yogur.",
    "ingredients": [
        "fresas",
        "yogur natural",
        "leche",
        "miel"
    ],
    "category": "bebidas",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/batido-fresa.jpg ",
    "difficulty": "facil"
},
{
    "title": "Sopa de Tomate",
    "description": "Una sopa cremosa hecha con tomates frescos y hierbas aromáticas.",
    "ingredients": [
        "tomates",
        "cebolla",
        "ajo",
        "aceite de oliva",
        "albahaca"
    ],
    "category": "entrante",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/sopa-tomate.jpg ",
    "difficulty": "facil"
},
{
    "title": "Pollo al Curry",
    "description": "Un plato exótico con pollo cocinado en una salsa de curry cremosa.",
    "ingredients": [
        "pollo",
        "leche de coco",
        "curry en polvo",
        "cebolla",
        "ajo"
    ],
    "category": "segundos",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/pollo-curry.jpg ",
    "difficulty": "medio"
},
{
    "title": "Helado de Vainilla",
    "description": "Un clásico helado casero con un toque de vainilla.",
    "ingredients": [
        "leche",
        "crema",
        "azúcar",
        "vainilla"
    ],
    "category": "postre",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/helado-vainilla.jpg ",
    "difficulty": "facil"
},
{
    "title": "Ceviche de Pescado",
    "description": "Un plato peruano con pescado marinado en limón y especias.",
    "ingredients": [
        "pescado blanco",
        "limón",
        "cebolla",
        "cilantro",
        "ají"
    ],
    "category": "entrante",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/ceviche-pescado.jpg ",
    "difficulty": "medio"
},
{
    "title": "Espaguetis a la Carbonara",
    "description": "Pasta italiana con una salsa cremosa de huevo, queso y panceta.",
    "ingredients": [
        "espaguetis",
        "huevos",
        "queso parmesano",
        "panceta",
        "pimienta"
    ],
    "category": "principal",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/carbonara.jpg ",
    "difficulty": "facil"
},
{
    "title": "Mojito Clásico",
    "description": "Un cóctel refrescante hecho con ron, menta y lima.",
    "ingredients": [
        "ron blanco",
        "lima",
        "menta",
        "azúcar",
        "agua mineral"
    ],
    "category": "bebidas",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/mojito.jpg ",
    "difficulty": "facil"
},
{
    "title": "Hamburguesa Casera",
    "description": "Una hamburguesa hecha en casa con carne fresca y toppings al gusto.",
    "ingredients": [
        "carne molida",
        "pan de hamburguesa",
        "queso",
        "lechuga",
        "tomate"
    ],
    "category": "principal",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/hamburguesa.jpg ",
    "difficulty": "facil"
},
{
    "title": "Tacos de Pollo",
    "description": "Tacos mexicanos rellenos de pollo desmenuzado y especias.",
    "ingredients": [
        "pollo",
        "tortillas de maíz",
        "cebolla",
        "cilantro",
        "limón"
    ],
    "category": "segundos",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/tacos-pollo.jpg ",
    "difficulty": "facil"
},
{
    "title": "Gazpacho Andaluz",
    "description": "Una sopa fría típica de España hecha con tomate y pepino.",
    "ingredients": [
        "tomate",
        "pepino",
        "pimiento",
        "ajo",
        "aceite de oliva"
    ],
    "category": "entrante",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/gazpacho.jpg ",
    "difficulty": "facil"
},
{
    "title": "Flan de Caramelo",
    "description": "Un postre cremoso con una capa de caramelo dorado.",
    "ingredients": [
        "leche",
        "huevos",
        "azúcar",
        "vainilla"
    ],
    "category": "postre",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/flan-caramelo.jpg ",
    "difficulty": "medio"
},
{
    "title": "Bistec a la Parrilla",
    "description": "Un bistec jugoso cocinado a la parrilla con especias.",
    "ingredients": [
        "bistec",
        "sal",
        "pimienta",
        "aceite de oliva",
        "ajo"
    ],
    "category": "segundos",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/bistec-parrilla.jpg ",
    "difficulty": "facil"
},
{
    "title": "Caprese Salad",
    "description": "Una ensalada simple pero deliciosa con tomate, mozzarella y albahaca.",
    "ingredients": [
        "tomate",
        "mozzarella",
        "albahaca",
        "aceite de oliva",
        "vinagre balsámico"
    ],
    "category": "ensaladas",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/caprese-salad.jpg ",
    "difficulty": "facil"
},
{
    "title": "Chiles Rellenos",
    "description": "Chiles rellenos de queso gratinados en salsa de tomate.",
    "ingredients": [
        "chiles poblanos",
        "queso",
        "huevo",
        "salsa de tomate"
    ],
    "category": "segundos",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/chiles-rellenos.jpg ",
    "difficulty": "medio"
},
{
    "title": "Limonada Fresca",
    "description": "Una bebida refrescante hecha con limones frescos y azúcar.",
    "ingredients": [
        "limones",
        "azúcar",
        "agua",
        "hielo"
    ],
    "category": "bebidas",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/limonada.jpg ",
    "difficulty": "facil"
},
{
    "title": "Arroz con Leche",
    "description": "Un postre clásico hecho con arroz, leche y canela.",
    "ingredients": [
        "arroz",
        "leche",
        "azúcar",
        "canela"
    ],
    "category": "postre",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/arroz-leche.jpg ",
    "difficulty": "facil"
}
]

{
    "title": "Sopa de Caracoles",
  "description": "Una sopa cremosa hecha con caracoles frescos y hierbas aromáticas.",
  "ingredients": [
    "caracoles",
    "cebolla",
    "ajo",
    "aceite de oliva",
    "albahaca"
  ],
  "category": "entrante",
  "imageUrl": "https://example.com/sopa-caracoles.jpg ",
  "difficulty": "facil"
}

item.name: Get Recipes Filtered By Category Copy
